item.title: 德国经济趋于稳定，商业前景有所改善
item.description: 德国 10 月份的商业前景有所改善，进一步证明该国的经济衰退可能正在结束。【原文：Germany’s business outlook improved in October — adding to evidence that the country’s economic downturn may be ending.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称上个月消费者通胀预期持续下降
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank —）的数据显示，欧元区消费者的通胀预期在9月份继续下降，这让政策制定者进一步确信，他们可能会比之前想象的更快达到目标。【原文：Inflation expectations of consumers in the euro zone continued declining in September, according to the European Central Bank — giving policymakers further confidence that they may reach their target sooner than previously thought.】

item.title: 大流行时代结束，奢侈品财富缩水 580 亿美元
item.description: 大流行时期，法国奢侈品和化妆品巨头的财富达到了前所未有的高度，消费者纷纷抢购价格不菲的手袋、礼服和美容产品。【原文：The wealth of France’s luxury and cosmetics titans swelled to unprecedented heights during the pandemic era, when consumers snapped up pricey handbags, gowns and grooming products.】

item.title: 如果税收获得批准，西班牙 Cepsa 公司将停止在绿色氢气上的投资
item.description: 西班牙的 Cepsa 公司表示，它可能会削减绿色氢气项目的开支，这是本周第三家欧洲炼油企业审查其减排所需技术的计划。【原文：Spain’s Cepsa said it could curb spending on green hydrogen projects, the third European oil refiner this week to review its plans on the technology needed to cut emissions.】

item.title: 肖尔茨承诺加强与印度的贸易往来以遏制中国的主导地位
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）呼吁进一步实现国家贸易多样化，他希望减少德国经济对中国的依赖，转而支持印度。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz called for further diversification of the nation’s trade as he looks to reduce the economy’s dependence on China in favor of India.】

item.title: 看好供过于求问题将得到解决，中国太阳能股票大涨
item.description: 本周，中国太阳能生产商的股票大涨，因为人们乐观地认为，政府将出面抑制生产，帮助控制产量过剩。【原文：Shares of China’s solar manufacturers surged this week amid optimism the government will step in to curb production to help rein in a output glut.】

item.title: 雷米、梅赛德斯盈利不佳，欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 欧洲股市周五下滑，人头马君度集团（Remy Cointreau SA）和梅赛德斯-奔驰集团（Mercedes-Benz Group AG）等大公司的财报不尽如人意，打击了投资者的情绪，因为投资者正在评估即将发生的多种风险事件。【原文：European stocks slipped on Friday, with underwhelming earnings from big names like Remy Cointreau SA and Mercedes-Benz Group AG hitting sentiment as investors assess multiple risk events on the horizon.】

item.title: 据称韩国将起诉法国巴黎银行非法卖空
item.description: 据直接知情人士透露，韩国检方已起诉法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）涉嫌违反卖空规则，这是韩国打击此类交易的最新进展。【原文：South Korean prosecutors have indicted BNP Paribas SA for allegedly violating short-selling rules, according to people with direct knowledge of the matter, the latest development in the country’s crackdown on such trades.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司公布向债权人筹集 30 亿英镑的计划
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water Utilities Ltd.）周五公布了一项提案，寻求从债权人处筹集多达 30 亿英镑（约合 39 亿美元）的资金，以争取更多的时间避免明年初进入特别管理阶段。【原文：Thames Water Utilities Ltd. unveiled a proposal on Friday that seeks to raise up to £3 billion ($3.9 billion) from its creditors to buy it more time to avoid going into special administration early next year.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利分析师称对 SK 海力士目标的判断 "错误
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）分析师在下调 SK Hynix 公司股票评级约六周后，上调了该公司的目标股价，此举是因为该银行出售该芯片制造商股票的订单引发了韩国市场监管机构的审查。【原文：Morgan Stanley analysts have raised their price target for SK Hynix Inc. about six weeks after downgrading the stock, a move that came after the bank’s sale order of the chipmaker’s shares triggered a review by South Korea’s market regulator.】

item.title: 首席执行官称 Leoni 收购交易将包括对银行贷款人的赔付
item.description: 去年德国汽车供应商莱奥尼公司（Leoni AG）重组时，银行贷款人损失惨重，如果与中国供应商力士德（Luxshare）的收购交易顺利进行，他们将获得一笔赔款。【原文：Bank lenders who suffered heavy losses when German auto supplier Leoni AG was restructured last year are set to receive a payout if a takeover deal with Chinese supplier Luxshare goes through.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股票将在 NatWest 财报发布前下挫
增长前景黯淡，印度中盘股走向调整
item.description: 随着投资者越来越担心盈利增长放缓和估值过高，中型股的强劲涨势即将进入调整区间。【原文：A blistering rally in mid-cap stocks is on course to enter correction territory, as investors become increasingly concerned over slowing earnings growth and elevated valuations.】

item.title: 赛诺菲公布利润增长，得益于疫苗的提前销售
item.description: 赛诺菲的利润增长得益于对流感疫苗和一种常见呼吸道病毒疫苗的需求，以及其大片皮肤和哮喘治疗药物 Dupixent 的进一步增长。【原文：Sanofi’s profit rose on demand for its flu vaccines and a shot for a common respiratory virus, as well as further growth in its blockbuster skin and asthma therapy Dupixent.】

item.title: 千禧年基金是因中国交易失败而亏损的对冲基金之一
item.description: 千禧管理公司（Millennium Management）和阿托斯资本有限公司（Athos Capital Ltd.）等对冲基金因涉及中国两家制药商的交易意外失败而蒙受损失。【原文：Millennium Management and Athos Capital Ltd. are among hedge funds that have lost money after the surprise collapse of a deal involving two of China’s drugmakers, said people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 行业组织称中国铜需求将于 2030 年达到顶峰
item.description: 据一位国家支持的政府研究人员称，中国的铜需求增长将在未来几年逐渐减弱，然后在本十年末达到顶峰。【原文：China’s copper demand growth will fade in coming years before topping out around the end of this decade, according to a state-backed government researcher, offering a potential counterpoint to bullish views on the metal’s prospects.】

item.title: 印度顶级交易所首席执行官称 IPO 取决于监管机构的批准
item.description: 印度最大的证券交易所首席执行官 Ashish Kumar Chauhan 表示，该交易所正在等待证券监管机构批准其公开上市计划。【原文：India’s largest stock exchange is awaiting clearance from the securities regulator to proceed with its public listing plans, according to Chief Executive Officer Ashish Kumar Chauhan.】

item.title: 美国市场助力利润扩张，Holcim 盈利攀升
item.description: 瑞士建筑解决方案供应商 Holcim Ltd. 受益于欧洲和美国盈利的建筑项目，第三季度盈利上升。【原文：Holcim Ltd. earnings rose in the third quarter as the Swiss building solutions provider benefited from profitable construction projects in Europe and the US.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行布洛克称 CPI 离目标还有 "一两年 "时间
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）表示，还需要 "一两年的时间"，通胀率才能可持续地回到2%-3%的目标范围内。【原文：Australia’s central bank Governor Michele Bullock said it will take “another year or two” before inflation is sustainably back within the 2-3% target, in a signal policy is likely to remain restrictive for some time yet.】

item.title: 违约服装制造商 Pan Brothers 发布重组计划
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，印度尼西亚大型服装制造商PT Pan Brothers公司自今年早些时候未能偿还债务以来，首次向债权人分发重组计划。【原文：Indonesia’s major clothes maker PT Pan Brothers is circulating a restructuring plan to creditors for the first time since missing a debt payment earlier this year, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 预期外汇储备将有所调整，挪威濒临崩溃的克朗或将上涨
item.description: 如果挪威中央银行着手对其货币储备管理方式进行预期中的改革，那么挪威遭受重创的克朗可能会得到一针强心剂。【原文：Norway’s battered krone may get a shot in the arm if the nation’s central bank proceeds with an expected change to the way it manages currency reserves.】

item.title: 俄罗斯将把关键利率恢复到入侵前水平
item.description: 俄罗斯央行准备在周五将其关键利率上调至总统弗拉基米尔-普京下令入侵乌克兰后创下的最高水平，因为政策制定者正在努力控制物价的快速增长。【原文：The Bank of Russia is poised to hike its key interest rate on Friday to the record level it imposed after President Vladimir Putin ordered the invasion of Ukraine, as policymakers struggle to contain rapid price growth.】

item.title: 亿万富豪泰凯克在全球范围内押注脏煤，力推环境、社会和治理（ESG
item.description: 当大多数投资者远离煤炭时，捷克亿万富翁帕维尔-蒂卡克（Pavel Tykac）却在加倍投资这种肮脏的燃料，只是不在他的祖国。【原文：As most investors turn away from coal, Czech billionaire Pavel Tykac is doubling down on the dirty fuel — just not in his home country.】

item.title: 价格上涨后中国钢铁集团呼吁限制供应
item.description: 在政府刺激政策刺激合金价格反弹之后，中国主要钢铁行业组织呼吁钢厂严格限制生产。【原文：China’s major steel industry group is calling for mills to be disciplined in restraining production after government stimulus efforts stoked a rebound in prices of the alloy.】

item.title: 菲律宾为何要建设资本市场以保持经济增长
item.description: 菲律宾正在重新引入利率掉期，并寻求促进债券回购协议市场的发展，以便为贷款定价建立替代基准，因为这个亚洲增长率最快的国家正在为增加资本需求做准备。这将有助于为一些项目提供资金，如可能恢复有争议的核设施、机场和基础设施，同时也有助于开发工业用地。该计划的效果如何还有待观察。【原文：The Philippines is reintroducing interest rate swaps and looking to boost the market for bond repurchase agreements to create alternative benchmarks for pricing loans, as the country posting some of the fastest growth rates in Asia prepares for increased capital demands. This would aid in financing for projects such as a potential revival of a controversial nuclear facility, airports and infrastructure, while also helping develop areas for industrial use. It remains to be seen how effective the】

item.title: 汇丰加入中国支付系统，推动人民币在中国的使用
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司已成为中国跨境银行间支付系统的直接参与者，因为这个世界第二大经济体正在推动人民币的更广泛使用。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has become a direct participant in China’s cross-border interbank payment system as the world’s second largest economy pushes for greater use of the yuan.】
